description.en:
MarX aims to build a dedicated NFT issuance system and blockchain-based easy payment system to expand the business of ecosystem partners. 
MarX Project tries to combine innovatory technologies(ex)Crss-chain, Inter-chain, BSN Ecosystem, PG Terminal) in their ecosystem.
Also, there are some products they prepared to construct their own mainnet such as DeFi-NFT Marketplace, Swap DEX, Coupon-Type NFT, and NFT Issuance management system.
